author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Indiabulls Real Estate Seeks Members' Nod For Divestment In Indiabulls Properties And/Or Indiabulls Real Estate Co By Overseas Units

organizations.name: indiabulls properties and/or indiabulls real estate co by overseas units feb

text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Indiabulls Real Estate Ltd:
* SEEKS MEMBERSâ€™ NOD FOR DIVESTMENT IN INDIABULLS PROPERTIES AND/OR INDIABULLS REAL ESTATE CO BY WHOLLY OWNED OVERSEAS UNITS
* SEEKS SHAREHOLDERS' NOD FOR DIVESTMENT OF STAKE IN INDIA LAND AND PROPERTIES LTD BY CO AND/OR UNIT OR SALE OF CHENNAI ASSETS Source text - bit.ly/2owJoDl Further company coverage:
